message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AR, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.HC 

This paper discusses the security vulnerabilities in hardware and software systems, and the techniques used to verify the security of SoC designs. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the interaction between hardware and software, which suggests it could also belong to cs.AR (Architecture), cs.SE (Software Engineering), and cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper discusses the impact of these vulnerabilities on users, which could place it in the cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) category.
